attributes.action: scrap the proposed introduction of ID cards, having not been satisfied by the PMs response to a previous petition on the same subject.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned have read and acknowledge the prime ministers response to this petition: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/IDcards/

However, we still feel that ID cards are a waste of time, and more importantly money. They will not improve security by any amount worth considering, and the sensitive data (such as fingerprints) that will be included on them is too much of an intrusion into the identities of British Nationals.

We have raised our views before, and they were ignored , please listen to the British people this time around.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
